#BlackMagicCraft #Episode152 #BEGINNER

This is a GREAT project for beginners to try. It covers a lot of the most fundamental elements of building miniature terrain for tabletop gaming and as the perfect piece to practice on.

GRAB THE TEMPLATE: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/284018/HEXAGON-Template
It's pay what you want so enter $0 to get it for free or donate a buck or two to support the channel!
